categories.name: Boot Issues
categories.description: Problems with system startup and boot processes

questions.title: Computer won't boot
questions.description: Computer fails to start or power on

questions.title: Black screen issue
questions.description: Monitor shows no display or black screen

questions.title: No internet connection
questions.description: Unable to connect to the internet

solutions.text: Check if the power cable is properly connected to both the computer and the wall outlet.
Try a different power outlet to rule out electrical issues.
Press and hold the power button for 10 seconds to perform a hard reset.
Check that your monitor is properly connected to the computer via HDMI, VGA, or DVI cable.
Make sure your monitor is powered on and set to the correct input source.
Check if other devices can connect to the same network to isolate the issue.
